newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch couple held after three children found dead.
newsitem.headline: Dutch couple held after three children found dead.

text.p: A Dutch couple were arrested on suspicion of murder on Wednesday night after the bodies of their three children were found at the family home, police said on Thursday.

Spokesman Alfred Ellwanger said police were summoned to a house in Hoofddorp near Amsterdam by friends of the family and found the corpses of three children -- a girl aged seven and two boys of eight and nine -- in a bedroom.
"We suspect that the parents are involved in the violent death of their children," he said. The parents had suffered kife wounds but it was not immediately known how the children had died.
